attributes.action: Improve mental health services for teenagers and young adults in education
attributes.additional_details: I don't know about you but I'm tired of the lack of help around for everyone. As a human right, we should be given the resources to help ourselves, our minds and our bodies through the stresses of everyday life. Please sign this petition to get the Government to finally listen to the people.
attributes.background: Mental Health affects everyone, at every age. Yet at schools, at Universities, where is the help? People get handed a leaflet and told to contact if they can. By then it might be too late.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you would like improvements to mental health services, but are not sure what improvements you would like the Government or Parliament to make.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to consider signing one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/224239
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231146
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/228007
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/228717
